step1.para: Install wheel chocks, open hood and drain air tanks
Raise front of vehicle and support with jack stands
Remove drive shaft
Remove fuel tank tie bar(s)
Drain transmission assembly fluid
Raise complete cab assembly, includes disconnect height control valve linkage
Disconnect clutch pedal linkage
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines
Remove clutch release bearing washer
Disconnect all transmission wiring
Disconnect all transmission air lines, includes reposition shifter boots
Remove shifting tower assembly
Remove transmission assembly mount bolts (all except four)
Secure transmission assembly to lifting device
Raise rear of vehicle and support with jack stands

note.para: This step necessary only if transmission can't be removed from under vehicle with rear wheels on the ground

step1.para: Remove transmission assembly including four remaining mount bolts
Secure fuel tank transfer pump and fuel lines out of the way with tie straps (if equipped)
Using shift lever, position transmission in gear

note.para: This step allows the output shaft to turn the input shaft and ease installation of transmission

step1.para: Install transmission assembly to vehicle and install four mount bolts
Remove transmission assembly lifting device
Lower rear of vehicle

note.para: This step necessary only if transmission can't be removed from under vehicle with rear wheels on the ground

step1.para: Install all remaining transmission assembly mount bolts and torque to spec
Install clutch release bearing washer
Connect transmission oil cooler lines
Connect clutch pedal linkage
Fill transmission with fluid
Reposition transmission to nuetral and install shifting tower assembly
Connect all transmission air lines including shifter boots
Connect all transmission wiring, includes install tie straps as necessary
Install fuel tank tie bar(s)
Lower complete cab assembly, includes connect height control valve linkage
Install drive shaft and torque to spec
Lower front of vehicle
Remove wheel chocks and close hood
